name: vespera-atelier
description: An intelligent platform for document-centric orchestration, task management, and creative workflows
author: EchoingVesper

scripts.build: pnpm run build:scriptorium && pnpm run build:utilities && pnpm run build:obsidian
scripts.build:scriptorium: cd packages/vespera-scriptorium && (test -d venv || python -m venv venv) && ./venv/bin/pip install -e '.[dev]' && ./venv/bin/python -m build
scripts.build:utilities: cd vespera-utilities && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.build:obsidian: cd plugins/Obsidian/Vespera-Scriptorium && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.dev:scriptorium: cd packages/vespera-scriptorium && (test -d venv || python -m venv venv) && ./venv/bin/pip install -e '.[dev]' && ./venv/bin/vespera-scriptorium --server
scripts.test: pnpm run test:scriptorium && pnpm run test:utilities && pnpm run test:obsidian
scripts.test:scriptorium: cd packages/vespera-scriptorium && (test -d venv || python -m venv venv) && ./venv/bin/pip install -e '.[dev]' && ./venv/bin/pytest tests/unit/ tests/integration/test_complete_task.py tests/integration/test_orchestrator.py tests/integration/test_task_execution.py -v
scripts.test:obsidian: cd plugins/Obsidian/Vespera-Scriptorium && npm test || echo 'Tests not yet implemented'
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint:scriptorium && pnpm run lint:utilities && pnpm run lint:obsidian
scripts.lint:scriptorium: cd packages/vespera-scriptorium && (test -d venv || python -m venv venv) && ./venv/bin/pip install -e '.[dev]' && ./venv/bin/flake8 vespera_scriptorium/ && ./venv/bin/mypy vespera_scriptorium/ || true
scripts.lint:utilities: cd vespera-utilities && npm run lint && npm run type-check
scripts.lint:obsidian: cd plugins/Obsidian/Vespera-Scriptorium && npm run lint || echo 'Linting not configured'
scripts.format: pnpm run format:scriptorium && pnpm run format:utilities && pnpm run format:obsidian
scripts.format:scriptorium: cd packages/vespera-scriptorium && (test -d venv || python -m venv venv) && ./venv/bin/pip install -e '.[dev]' && ./venv/bin/black vespera_scriptorium/ && ./venv/bin/isort vespera_scriptorium/
scripts.format:obsidian: cd plugins/Obsidian/Vespera-Scriptorium && npm run format || echo 'Formatting not configured'
scripts.clean: pnpm run clean:scriptorium && pnpm run clean:utilities && pnpm run clean:obsidian
scripts.clean:scriptorium: cd packages/vespera-scriptorium && rm -rf build/ dist/ *.egg-info/ .pytest_cache/ && find . -type d -name __pycache__ -exec rm -rf {} +
scripts.clean:utilities: cd vespera-utilities && rm -rf dist/ build/ node_modules/.cache/
scripts.clean:obsidian: cd plugins/Obsidian/Vespera-Scriptorium && rm -rf dist/ build/ node_modules/.cache/
scripts.typecheck: pnpm run typecheck:utilities && pnpm run typecheck:obsidian
scripts.typecheck:obsidian: cd plugins/Obsidian/Vespera-Scriptorium && npx tsc --noEmit || echo 'TypeScript check not configured'
scripts.setup:dev: pnpm setup && pip install pre-commit && pre-commit install
